Da (XIV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |uma and Da provide words and sentences at Mowbray. These mostly include terms from everyday life, such as objects of use and parts of the body. 1) This story is found in Book XIII & XIV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: |uma and Da at Mowbray
